name: Choose Your Character
description:
!!!WARNING!!! THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND HAS BEEN DIVIDED INTO CHAPTERS.

Lucas, a 15-year-old boy, went to visit an abandoned mall.

When he enters this mall, he finds an armless and legless mannequin named Amy being attacked by another mannequin, Lucas goes to Amy's rescue.

After That, Amy explains to Lucas that there are 3 mannequins (Melody, Joy and Rey) trapped in 3 locked cabins and that the keys to unlock these cabins have been stolen by evil mannequins, unfortunately she cannot go looking these keys because she has no limbs, she also explains to Lucas that her limbs were torn and destroyed by these same mannequins.

Lucas will then have to collect each key to unlock each cabin, he will be accompanied by a mannequin each time.

Will he be able to help Amy and the 3 mannequins escape this mall ?

You will find out by playing Choose Your Character.

Made with Wolf RPG Editor.

CONTROLS :

-Directional arrows to move around.

-0 to open inventory.
